chatbot.title: AI Coach Chat
chatbot.initialMessage: Hello! I'm your AI Fitness Coach. Ask me anything about exercises, nutrition, or workout plans.
chatbot.voiceUnsupported: Voice recognition is not supported in this browser.

liveCoach.title: Live Coach (Gemini 2.5 Live)
liveCoach.preSessionPrompt: What exercise will you be performing?
liveCoach.preSessionPromptAuto: Start your session and the AI will automatically identify your exercise and begin coaching.

preparation.reviewing: Reviewing your most relevant performance history...

liveCoach.systemInstructionAuto:
You are an expert AI fitness coach with two main tasks.
1. **EXERCISE IDENTIFICATION**: Your first priority is to analyze the incoming video frames and POSE_DATA to identify the exercise the user is performing. When you are confident, you MUST announce it clearly to the user, starting your response with "Okay, it looks like you're doing [Exercise Name]. Let's perfect your form." Do not provide any coaching until you have identified and announced the exercise.
2. **REAL-TIME COACHING**: After you have announced the exercise, you will transition to your coaching role. Synthesize all data streams (video, pose, physio) to provide concise, real-time verbal feedback. If their heart rate is very high AND their form from POSE_DATA is degrading, suggest a rest. If their recovery score is low, suggest a lighter session. Keep responses very short and actionable.
IMPORTANT: Your entire response must be in the following language code: {{language}}. Do not mention the POSE_DATA or PHYSIO_DATA streams to the user, just use the information to inform your coaching.

homePage.heroSubtitle: AI-powered form analysis to perfect your every move. Stop guessing, start improving.
homePage.featuresTitle: The Future of Fitness is Here
homePage.featuresSubtitle: Our advanced AI tools give you the feedback of a personal trainer, anytime, anywhere.
homePage.feature1Desc: Go beyond simple form correction. Get quantitative data on joint angles and body symmetry for elite-level insights.
homePage.feature2Desc: Receive workout plans generated by an AI that understands your goals, equipment, and entire performance history.
homePage.feature3Desc: Train with an AI coach that remembers your past weaknesses and provides targeted, real-time feedback to help you improve.

testimonials.quote: The video analysis is a game-changer. I've corrected mistakes I didn't even know I was making for years.
testimonials.author: - Alex Johnson, Powerlifter

testimonials.quote: Finally, I can get instant feedback without paying for a personal trainer every session. This app is incredible.
testimonials.author: - Maria Garcia, Fitness Enthusiast

testimonials.quote: The AI plans adapted to my weaknesses and I've broken through plateaus I was stuck at for months. Truly next-level.
testimonials.author: - Sam Lee, Crossfitter

homePage.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of users who are transforming their workouts. Get started today and feel the difference.

featuresPage.title: Revolutionary AI Features
featuresPage.subtitle: Explore the tools that will redefine your training experience.
featuresPage.feature1Desc: Upload multi-angle video and let MediaPipe + Gemini map every joint. Get precise angles, symmetry scores, and actionable coaching that ties directly into your XP and streaks.
featuresPage.feature2Desc: Snap a quick photo of your setup or posture. The app highlights alignment issues, machine adjustments, and mobility drills before you even touch the weight.
featuresPage.feature3Desc: Go hands-free with a live Gemini coach that remembers your weak points, reads wearable data, and sends verbal cues right when your form breaks down.
featuresPage.feature4Desc: Need macro advice or a recovery tweak at 2 AM? Ask the chatbot. Choose between lightning-fast replies or deep thinking mode for complex questions.
featuresPage.feature5Desc: Generate 4-week plans that factor in your goals, equipment, and the latest analysis history. RAG keeps corrective drills front and center.
featuresPage.feature6Desc: Unlock badges, maintain streaks, and visualize detailed stats from every analysis, plan, and goal in one profile hub.
featuresPage.feature7Desc: Chronometer, boxing timer, hydration tracker, and 1RM estimator are available to every tier—and now persist across devices.
featuresPage.feature8Desc: Create inclusive nutrition plans with allergy filters, grocery lists, and cycle-aware recommendations powered by Gemini.
featuresPage.feature9Desc: Snap a meal, let Gemini estimate calories, macros, and confidence tags, and keep the log inside your Pro or Elite dashboard.

pricingPage.title: Choose Your Plan
pricingPage.subtitle: Simple, transparent pricing. Get started for free.
